message.body: As always right thing right time. You're the best best friend.
Aw thanks baby, you're always the best. Anything new with you? Reading cutting for stone and it's feeling real good so far
Nothing new really, I taught a master class yesterday bc I'm a master
Hehehe
You're a master of many things...
Like watching pretty little liars!!!!!!!! WATCH IT
Did u ever read the other milan kunderis book with laughter in the title? Its crazy that EVERyONE loves that show - it must be real good I just can't commit to
Siiting still!!
Which show? Did they make a show of it?
No pretty little liars lol
But the book question was separate and I wanted to know if you've read his other stuff
Oh hah. No I haven't but I want to. But yea, PLL. It's real good when you can commit. I get excited to be in there world
Omg i was reduced to using there when I should have used their
I didn't wanna text anything - I pinched my texting thumb
Hah. I giggled when I read "enough small write" in your card
Just changing the lingo to fit the day. Speaking of, I had to work with a 16 year old today. Geez what a mind fuck?!?
Why? What was she or he doing?
You know how we're always saying "boy I never thought being 24 would be like this" - well I think we're WAY further from where we were when we were in HS. More
So than we thought. She just started dating a guy yesterday and she said "geeez, do people not even have FB? I just put my relationship status on fb and STILL
Some guy texted me and asked me on a date!" - she wasn't even being sarcastic
And then we talked about her sweet sixteen and her SAT score.
I bet we would Be a great influence on her. Same fears about success and romance, just better at hiding them.
But good that you sensed some growth on our part
Yep - it was just weird to be positioning myself as the "I'm shocked the youth of our country are so different than us" Old guy
